item.title: TLS mapping of Devil's Cave
item.description: Shooting lasers at speleothems - On July 08-09-10 we had a great field trip to the Devil’s Cave. The goal of this trip was to collect Terrestrial LiDAR (TLS) data of the touristic sector of the cave. But before that, we needed to establish a series of fixed points with precise coordinates, which are used...

item.title: "Garcia Garden" quarry
item.description: 3D modeling of a vertical wall with SfM and a UAV - On March 28th and April 3rd we had two nice field trips to the “Garcia Garden” quarry. The goal was to acquire images with our drone to create a 3D model of the wall. The model will be used by Camila and Fernanda to determine the attitude (dip direction, dip)...

item.title: SPAMLabs's website is online
item.description: We finally have a website! - Thanks to Dean Attali, SPALab now has a website. This is still an early draft, and more sections and material will be added over the weeks to come. Thanks are extended to RECON (The R Epidemics Consortium), since their site was used as an example to set up this one....
